snippet: The president’s earnings are lower because he is getting fewer royalties from his two books.
abstract: Pres Obama's 2012 tax returns show his personal income has dropped in the four years since he was first inaugurated, thanks mostly to declining sales of his two best-selling books.
lead_paragraph: The president’s earnings are lower because he is getting fewer royalties from his two books.

headline.main: Obamas’ Income Has Dropped, Their Tax Returns Show
headline.print_headline: Obamas’ Income Has Dropped, Their Tax Returns Show
